div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 338px; height: 1px; padding-top: 430px; margin-left: 3531px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

font.font:
Maintains Websocket connections with Chat relay server
Use Auth token for handshake & establish connection
Once the connection is established, only new messages will be recieved / sent over the connection
Older messages can be fetched through API (DB / S3 cache)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 598px; height: 1px; padding-top: 835px; margin-left: 3932px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
text-align: center ; font-size: 23px

li.font: A dumb service that maintains websocket connections with the client

ul.li: After authentication, uses gRPC to subscribe to the client's team(s)
Publishes the received message from the client, to the message broker
Message recieved via Controller Service, is broadcasted to all the connected clients belonging to the intented team

switch.text: Chat Websocket Relay: DUMBA dumb service that maintains websocket connections with the clientAfter a...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 378px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1110px; margin-left: 3701px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 598px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1745px; margin-left: 2472px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
text-align: center ; font-size: 23px

ul.li: Subsribe to Message Broker and ingests all the recieved messages
Ingested message is pushed to DB for persistence, asynchronously
Inform all the connected Chat Relay Services, which have subscribed for the channel, so as to broadcast the message further to connected clients / endpoints

switch.text: Chat Controller: (Intelligent) Subsribe to Message Broker and ingests all the recieved messagesInges...

li.font: Caches messages from DB to Block Storage
Triggers in a set interval of time
Purges Chat from DB after caching
